question: حاصل $\sin x\left[ \begin{matrix} \sin x & \cos x \\ \cos x & \sin x \\ \end{matrix} \right]+\cos x\left[ \begin{matrix} \cos x & -\sin x \\ -\sin x & \cos x \\ \end{matrix} \right]$ کدام است؟
explanation: $\sin x\left[ \begin{matrix} \sin x & \cos x \\ \cos x & \sin x \\ \end{matrix} \right]+\cos x\left[ \begin{matrix} \cos x & -\sin x \\ -\sin x & \cos x \\ \end{matrix} \right]$ $=\left[ \begin{matrix} {{\sin }^{2}}x & \sin x\cos x \\ \sin x\cos x & {{\sin }^{2}}x \\ \end{matrix} \right]+\left[ \begin{matrix} {{\cos }^{2}}x & -\sin x\cos x \\ -\sin x\cos x & {{\cos }^{2}}x \\ \end{matrix} \right]$ $=\left[ \begin{matrix} {{\sin }^{2}}x+{{\cos }^{2}}x & 0 \\ 0 & {{\sin }^{2}}x+{{\cos }^{2}}x \\ \end{matrix} \right]=\left[ \begin{matrix} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \\ \end{matrix} \right]=I$
